scripts.test:dev: TEST_ENV=dev dotenvx run -f config/.env.dev -- playwright test
scripts.test:local: TEST_ENV=local dotenvx run -f config/.env.local -- playwright test
scripts.test:ui:local: TEST_ENV=local dotenvx run -f config/.env.local -- playwright test --ui
scripts.test:ui:dev: TEST_ENV=dev dotenvx run -f config/.env.dev -- playwright test --ui
scripts.test:debug:local: TEST_ENV=local dotenvx run -f config/.env.local -- playwright test --debug
scripts.test:debug:dev: TEST_ENV=dev dotenvx run -f config/.env.dev -- playwright test --debug
scripts.test:update-snapshots:local: TEST_ENV=local dotenvx run -f config/.env.local -- playwright test --update-snapshots --grep 'Visual Regression'
scripts.test:update-snapshots:dev: TEST_ENV=dev dotenvx run -f config/.env.dev -- playwright test --update-snapshots --grep 'Visual Regression'
scripts.postinstall: cd test-target && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm run build
